Name: Egg Teacher VR
About the game: Ever wonder if you’d make a good egg teacher? How about an egg lecturer? Well, wonder no more, for in Egg Teacher VR you can do just that! Though, actually, you’ll do anything but teach the eggs – prepare to deal with a color-locked computer, noisy students and invasions of paper planes, houseflies or computer mice – and that’s just the tip of the iceberg! Test your reflexes in varied challenges requiring speed and precision; race against the timer earning points for speed and accuracy, and perhaps you’ll make your way to the top of the scoreboard! Created by students of the University of Wroclaw in Poland with the team leader Łukasz Piwowar, Ph.D. as part of the Unity VR course. Credits Mateusz Ożóg Patryk Kumor Adam Chabecki Mateusz Maciejewski Adrian Kamiński Jan Wnęk Andrzej Milczarek Dominika Zaleska
